title: Friday night football scoreboard
text:
Friday night football scoreboard Friday night football scoreboard 
Bishop Gorman fullback Alex Lazarou (34) celebrates as the final seconds wind down in the second half of their prep football game against Don Bosco at Bishop Gorman High School in Las Vegas Friday Oct. 23, 2015. Bishop Gorman defeated Don Bosco Prep 30-16.
